nodes.text: Tulo the Fearless was a male Human Jedi living during or after the Cold War.

Tulo the Fearless was added to Star Wars: The Old Republic with Knights of the Eternal Throne expansion as a World Boss for Dark vs. Light system. Whenever Light side of the Force reaches victory state on a server, Tulo the Fearless has a chance to spawn at one or more of selected locations on Alderaan alongside other Light Side World Bosses. Though killing him is required for an in-game achievement, it is impossible the year when his death took place.
